name: The Visit
description:
The Visit is a short Horror experience , come peer at what lies beyond the door.

"Look, I know you haven’t seen a lot of your Grandma and that’s my fault, but, she’s not doing well.

I think you should go up there to see her, it’s the right thing to do. She’s become a bit of a recluse lately so she’ll enjoy the company.

I’ll fly out on the weekend and meet you there.

Love you, see you soon. Oh, make sure you pack lots of warm clothes, apparently it’s record snowfall."

---Controls---

E- to open doors.

Left Click- To interact.

Space bar -- To peek inside.

WASD- Movement

(This game contains assets available on the unreal store)
